# Data process


## Ireland


### Wave 1

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `Bloods_CHOL` |
|-|-|
| **Label** |  |
| **Table name** | `TILDA-AMF-v16` |
| **Categories:**| `continuous` |
| **Missings:**| `Missing`<br/>`No Consent`<br/>`Insufficient Sample`<br/>`NA` |
| **Description** |  | 

   

```{r assign w1, echo=F }

opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'TILDA_w1','TILDA.TILDA-AMF-v16', variables=list('Bloods_CHOL'), missings = TRUE)
TILDA_w1 <- opal.execute(o,'TILDA_w1')

```


```{r prep}

TILDA_w1$Bloods_CHOL[which(TILDA_w1$Bloods_CHOL == "Missing")] <- "999"
TILDA_w1$Bloods_CHOL[which(TILDA_w1$Bloods_CHOL == "No Consent")] <- "997"
TILDA_w1$Bloods_CHOL[which(TILDA_w1$Bloods_CHOL == "Insufficient Sample")] <- "993"
TILDA_w1$Bloods_CHOL <- as.numeric(TILDA_w1$Bloods_CHOL)

```

```{r local w1, echo=F}

vbl <- TILDA_w1$Bloods_CHOL
vbl_miss <- miss_values_vector
kable(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)[3], caption = "Bloods_CHOL") 
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(filter(TILDA_w1,!vbl %in% vbl_miss), aes(Bloods_CHOL)) + geom_histogram(stat="count", fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `total_chol` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `multiply mmol/L by 38.67`
* `Missing into 999`
* `No Consent into 997`
* `Insufficient Sample into 993`

**R script:**

```{r harmo w1}

TILDA_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=TILDA_w1$id)
TILDA_ds_w1$total_chol <- car::recode(TILDA_w1$Bloods_CHOL, "NA = 999")
TILDA_ds_w1$total_chol[which(!TILDA_ds_w1$total_chol %in% miss_values_vector)] <- 38.67*TILDA_ds_w1$total_chol[which(!TILDA_ds_w1$total_chol %in% miss_values_vector)]

```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript w1, echo=F}

vbl <- TILDA_ds_w1$total_chol
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(filter(TILDA_ds_w1,!vbl %in% miss_values_vector), aes(total_chol)) + geom_histogram(stat="count", fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")

```

```{r summ, echo=F}

l.hds <- list(w1 = TILDA_ds_w1)
m.hds <- list()

for(name in names(l.hds)) {
  aux_object <- l.hds[[name]]
  label(l.hds[[name]][[2]]) <- label(aux_object[[2]]) <- ds_label # Text value assigned at the DS description, at the top
  l.hds[[name]][[2]] <- labelled(l.hds[[name]][[2]], labels = cont_label)
  aux_object[[2]] <- car::recode(aux_object[[2]], "miss_values_vector=NA")
  aux_object[[2]] <- labelled(aux_object[[2]], labels = cont_label)
  m_name <- paste0("TILDA_m_ds_",name)
  assign(m_name, aux_object)
  m.hds[[name]] <- get(paste0("TILDA_m_ds_",name))
  rm(aux_object)
}
```
